Texts.Chs: 把^orange;加工台^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Machining Table^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Great! Welcome, and feel free to look around and get comfortable. You're welcome here. Use the facilities if you please.

Greetings, human! I am Vinalisj, the Director of this facility. Before you can really get started here you'll need to prove your worth. Make a ^orange;Machining Table^white;. ^green;Build one on your default crafting menu [C]^reset; and bring it here.
